attributes.action: Train all UK frontline Police Officers to use a firearm and allow access to one
attributes.additional_details:
Here in the United Kingdom there are 6000 armed police officers compared to 128000 armed police officers in France. 

Look at the catastrophic  consequences of the Terrorist Attacks in Paris on Friday 13th November 2015 with 128000 armed police officers. 
The government should act now and train and arm all frontline police officers. 
Police do not need to carry a firearm constantly but have these available locked away.

Also all frontline officers to carry a Tazor.
